sqoop.arg: SELECT AcquisitionID,Acquisition,AcquisitionCode,Description, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Acquisition WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariableTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID,VariableTypeID,NoHeads,NoSamples,NoPositions,EntryOrder,Formula, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariableType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionStatusID,ActionStatus,ConditionalFormat,IsClosedState, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetCycleCountID,AssetID,RfDayPeriodID,Count,AssetCountTypeID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetCycleCount WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,TargetSampleSize,RfAttrStudyTypeID,Instructions,ImageURI,NoHeads,RfSourceID,DataDeviceID,DeviceArgs,DeviceOutput, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AVAttribute WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CauseActionID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedCauseActionID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CauseAction_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CostCentreID,CostCentre,Description, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CostCentre WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DepartmentID,Name,DepartmentGroup,Classification1,PlantID,DepartmentCode,Description, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Department WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT FaultStatusID,FaultStatus,Description,RfFaultStatusID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.FaultStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT InvStateID,InvState,Description,RfInvStateID,InvStateCode,IsAddToProduction,IsAddToHFI,IsDefault, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InvState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LineTypeID,LineType,Description,IsRetired,LineInfoPrecedence,BudgetChangeOver,BudgetEfficiency, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ConcernID,DocumentID,LKConcernDocumentID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkConcernDocument WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentInvPackID,DocumentID,InventoryPackID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentInvPack WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LineID,LineSectionID,LkLLSID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkLLS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStopReasonGroupID,MachineStopReasonID,LkMSRGMSRID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMSRGMSR WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkPartSupplierID,PartID,SupplierID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkPartSupplier WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolTypeID,OperationTypeID,MaxNoTools,LkToolTypeOpTypeID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkToolTypeOpType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkWIRBuildRecordID,WorkInstructionResultID,BuildRecordID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkWIRBuildRecord WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageInvPositionId,MachineStageId,Position,PositionNumber, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageInvPosition WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceManHoursID,MaintenanceWorkID,WorkerLoginID,ActualManHours,RevisionNo,IsEdited,ModifiedDT,SupplierID,SupplierCost,PersonnelGroupID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceManHours WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureRevisionID,MaintenanceProcedureID,FromDT,ToDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,LoginID,ModifiedDT,RevisedMaintProcID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureRevision WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintProcScheduleOnAssetID,MaintenanceProcedureID,AssetID,RfPeriodTypeID,StartDate,AssetCountTypeID,EBAReference,IsEdited,LoginID,ModifiedDT,CalendarN1,CalendarN2,CalendarN3,CounterThreshold1,CounterThreshold2,CounterThreshold3,EstimatedCountPerDay,RunHourThreshold1,RunHourThreshold2,RunHourThreshold3,EstimatedRunHoursPerDay,EstimatedEventsPerDay,RevisionNo,IsRetired,PriorExecutions, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintProcScheduleOnAsset WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCConstantID,OPCItemID,Description,Constant,Formula,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCConstant WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCMachineEventID,OPCItemID,Description,Formula,ModifiedDT,LoginID,RfMachineStopRecordModeID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCMachineEvent WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OperationID,OperationTypeID,MachineStageID,JobID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Operation WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ProductID,ProductTypeID,Name,Description,IsRetired,PartID,Variant1,Variant2,Variant3,Variant4,Variant5,Variant6,Variant7,Variant8,Variant9,Variant10,Variant11,Variant12,Variant13,Variant14,Variant15,Variant16,Variant17,Variant18,Variant19,Variant20, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Product WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ScrapID,ScrapReasonID,PartID,Quantity,UnitID,DT,MachineStageID,IsEdited,RevisionNo, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Scrap WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SettingsPlantTimeWindowsID,JobHistory,ProductionSpoilageHistory,DowntimeHistory,InventoryHistory,InventoryLabelHistory,BuildRecordHistory,LineInfoHistory,QualityMeasurementHistory,ProcessParameterHistory,OPCItemHistoryHistory,InitialLineInfoHistory,MaintenanceProjectionPeriod,ShiftLookAheadDays,ForwardSchedulingWindow,DefaultMaxTrendRecallWindow,DefaultConcernDuePeriod, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SettingsPlantTimeWindows WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCCalcStyleID,SPCCalcStyle,CmThreshold,CpThreshold,PpThreshold,CgThreshold,RnRThreshold,IsShowCpOnlyIfStable,CAMTarget,CpBasedOnID,CLBasedOnID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCCalcStyle_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartSetViewStyleID,SPCChartSetViewStyle,IsSpecLimits,IsControlLimitZones,IsGrid,IsTimescaled,IsHAxis,IsVAxis,IsXChart,IsRsChart,IsRsWChart,IsDistribution,IsShowComments,IsXScatter,IsIncludeIgnored,IsOnlyOSOCCharts,SPCStatsStyleID,IsVerticalOverview,OverviewWidth,OverviewHeight,PageBreakRfCutByIDs,ChartWidth,ChartHeight,IsFixedScale,IsParetoCurve,IsLegend,IsHorizontalDistribution,IsSigmaLines,IsShowCAComments,IsShowUnAckAlarms,HorizontalOffset,IsShowLimitLabels,IsColourZones,IsSystem,IsOSHotCold,FixedScaleOverscaling,IsConstantTitleRow,IsShowStatCategories,IsOverlayEnvelope,IsGradientBackground,RunChartFont,DistributionFont,StatisticsFont,VAxisFont,HAxisFont,OverlayKeyFont,IsShowOverlayKey, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartSetViewStyle_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SupplierID,Supplier,SupplierCode,AddressID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Supplier WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagProfileID,Name, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagProfile WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,JobID,AcquisitionContextID,Checks_Done, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TMP_Checks_Done WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolAtLocationID,LocationID,ToolID,FromDT,ToDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,EditedToolAtLocationID,MovedByLoginID,ModifiedDT,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolAtLocation WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolTypeID,ToolType,ToolTypeCode,Description,Variant1TagListID,Variant2TagListID,Variant3TagListID,Variant4TagListID,Variant5TagListID,Variant6TagListID,Variant7TagListID,Variant8TagListID,Variant9TagListID,Variant10TagListID,Variant11TagListID,Variant12TagListID,Variant13TagListID,Variant14TagListID,Variant15TagListID,Variant16TagListID,Variant17TagListID,Variant18TagListID,Variant19TagListID,Variant20TagListID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT UnitCountTypeGroupID,UnitCountTypeGroup,Description, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCountTypeGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WOID,WONumber,RunNo,PartID,QuantityOrdered,RfJobStatusID,DeadlineDT,ActualStartDT,ActualEndDT,PlannedStartDT,PlannedEndDT,EstimatedStartDT,EstimatedEndDT,CustomerID,IsDiscrete,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5,WORefID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WO WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WorkInstructionStepID,WorkInstructionStep,WorkInstructionProcedureID,OperationTypeID,StepOrder,RfSpecialActionTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WorkInstructionStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WO.WOID, WO.WONumber, WO.RunNo, WO.PartID, WO.QuantityOrdered, WO.RfJobStatusID, WO.DeadlineDT, WO.ActualStartDT, WO.ActualEndDT, WO.PlannedStartDT, WO.PlannedEndDT, WO.EstimatedStartDT, WO.EstimatedEndDT, WO.CustomerID, WO.IsDiscrete, WO.Reference1, WO.Reference2, WO.Reference3, WO.Reference4, WO.Reference5, WO.WORefID, WO_.CustomerOrderNo, WO_.LabelsPerInventoryPack, WO_.ItemsPerInventoryPack, WO_.ItemsPerLayer, WO_.LayersPerInventoryPack, WO_.PackingCode, WO_.LabelTemplate, WO_.LabelColour, WO_.EANCode, WO_.CusStartNum, WO_.CusEndNum, WO_.CustomerPartNo, WO_.CustomerPartDescription, WO_.LabelText1, WO_.LabelText2, WO_.LabelText3, WO_.PrinterURL, WO_.BOMVariantID, WO_custom.BaseWONumber, WO_custom.Txn_date, WO_custom.Wip_Entity_ID, WO_custom.Alternate_Bom, WO_custom.WO_Status, WO_custom.IsBtoCto, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM WO FULL JOIN WO_ ON (WO.WOID = WO_.WOID) FULL JOIN WO_custom ON (WO.WOID = WO_custom.WOID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
